about_the_game:
Carvival is a roguelite top-down shooter where you control a customized, weaponized car, navigating diverse biomes, battling foes, and collecting resources to reach each biome's exit. Unique boss enemies await at the end of each biome. In the hidden Garage Nexus, you can upgrade your vehicle with weapons like poison gas, bombs, axes, and a katana, offering strategic gameplay. This game blends action with a story of resilience, investigating "The Pulse" origins in a transformed world.

Mechanics


  • Move and Shoot:
    Steering the car ensures your weapons target enemies effectively; weapons operate automatically, with some locking onto targets while others fire continuously.

  • Drifting:
    Your car tires create various effects during drifts, such as fire, toxic smoke, ice, or incendiary oil. Abilities: When you discover perk cards, you gain new abilities like Attack Speed, Damage, Max Health, Double Bullets, Electric Bullets, Fire Bullets, and Ice Bullets.

  • Weapons:
    You can carry four different skills that activate automatically, triggering various combos depending on timing and location. Your weapons include emitting poison gas, throwing bombs from behind, throwing boomerang-like axes, and katana

  • Garage Nexus:
    Here, you enhance your vehicles on a session-by-session basis using collected gold. Enemies: Varied adversaries attempt to harm you, including those who charge and explode, throw bombs, or launch explosive projectiles.

short_description: Carvival is a top-down roguelite vehicle combat game. Mission is to destroy enemy vehicles, gather resources, and upgrade your car. Wreck bigger vehicles as you progress. Gain in-game perks. Create powerful combos with auto-trigger weapons. The mantra? Drive, shoot, drift, repeat, and power up!
